description: Concert Finder allows you to find concerts going on around the country. You can search for specific artists or browse what concerts are going on in a particular city. The app allows you to keep track of favorite artists, view event photos, get directions to venues, purchase tickets and add events to your calendar. Concert Finder is powered by preAmped.com, the most comprehensive concert listing system. Currently, only US cities are featured. New in version 1.6, send concert info directly to Twitter and Facebook! If you experience any issues downloading or installing this app, please contact Palm support at  1-877-426-3777.
